content.description: A consumer group is investigating the number of flights at a certain airline that are overbooked. They conducted a simulation to estimate the probability of overbooked flights in the next 5 flights. The results of 1,000 trials are shown in the following histogram.
content.question: Based on the histogram, what is the probability that at least 4 of the next 5 flights at the airline will be overbooked?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
